title: 3.0.0.CR2 AmbiguousResolutionException for type jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Providers
body:
### Describe the bug

I attempted to migrate my project to quarkus 3.0.0.CR2 and got this error during building:
```
    java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
```
